Class CommandStackTest

java.lang.Object
taskmanagement.application.viewmodel.commands.CommandStackTest
public final class CommandStackTest extends Object
JUnit 4 tests for the command stack (execute/undo/redo) used in the tasks management application. Verifies behavior of AddTaskCommand, UpdateTaskCommand, DeleteTaskCommand, and MarkStateCommand against an in-memory fake DAO using a minimal mutable task double.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    CommandStackTest()
     

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    add_execute_undo_redo()
    Ensures AddTaskCommand adds a row and reflects an assigned id, then validates that undo deletes the row and redo reinserts it with the same id.
    void
    delete_execute_undo_redo()
    Ensures DeleteTaskCommand removes a row on execute, restores it with the same id on undo, and removes it again on redo.
    void
    mark_state_execute_undo_redo()
    Ensures MarkStateCommand changes state on execute, restores the previous state on undo, and reapplies the new state on redo.
    void
    setUp()
    Initializes the in-memory DAO and command stack before each test.
    void
    update_execute_undo_redo()
    Ensures UpdateTaskCommand applies the updated snapshot on execute, restores the original snapshot on undo, and reapplies the update on redo.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      public void add_execute_undo_redo() throws Exception
      Ensures AddTaskCommand adds a row and reflects an assigned id, then validates that undo deletes the row and redo reinserts it with the same id.
      Throws:
      Exception - if the command execution fails unexpectedly

      Ensures UpdateTaskCommand applies the updated snapshot on execute, restores the original snapshot on undo, and reapplies the update on redo.
      Throws:
      Exception - if the command execution fails unexpectedly

    • delete_execute_undo_redo

      public void delete_execute_undo_redo() throws Exception
      Ensures DeleteTaskCommand removes a row on execute, restores it with the same id on undo, and removes it again on redo.
      Throws:
      Exception - if the command execution fails unexpectedly

    • mark_state_execute_undo_redo

      public void mark_state_execute_undo_redo() throws Exception
      Ensures MarkStateCommand changes state on execute, restores the previous state on undo, and reapplies the new state on redo.
      Throws:
      Exception - if the command execution fails unexpectedly
